name: FlickFinder
0:
”Alexa ask flick finder to suggest me top two thriller movies”
”Alex ask flick finder to tell me two popular TV shows”
”Alexa ask flick finder to tell me the list of upcoming movies”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flick finder
des:
Are you struggling to find a good film or a TV show according to your choice? 
Are you looking for a good action, comedy, thriller or horror film to watch with your loved ones? 
Are you struggling to find a most trending TV series?

If your answer is 'yes' then this skill can help you out by using its algorithm to fulfill your requirements within a few seconds. This skill leverage the detailed knowledge of more than 50,000,000 films an TV shows across the globe to answer your queries aptly.  

- Use this skill to know top trending movies or TV series of a week. Just ask "Alexa, tell me top trending movies." 
- It can also tell you top-rated movies or TV shows of any region or country. Say "Alexa, tell me top rated TV shows." 
- Also, it can tell you about the movies or TV shows which have been aired on now. Ask "Alexa, which movies are playing now? "
- If you are planning for the next movie night out, this skill can help you by letting you know about upcoming movies /TV shows. Just ask "Alexa, tell me the list of upcoming movies."
- Moreover, this skill can suggest a film/TV show within a specific genre, based on popularity, year of release and place of release.  Say "Alexa suggest me two thriller movies"
